Name: Lee: Palefire
BtnContent: I got it, Lee.
Contents: I found this flower during one of the missions. After looking up the database, I realized it was from the same family as the one you gave me.
Seeing this flower...made me think of someone. Such coincidence was an extremely rare event, statistically.
To me, it was of significant value for research... I preserved it, so I could give it to the person it led me to.
According to the data from Golden Age, flowers had a language of their own. So...here's my reply to you.

Name: Lucia: Lotus
BtnContent: Let's talk about something you enjoy.
Contents: Commandant, everybody told me to come here because I got a gift from you. What did they mean?
Are you trying to tell me something? Sorry I can't hear you, you're stuttering quite a bit.
Just say it. I'll remember everything you say. Anything.

Name: Liv: Eclipse
BtnContent: No problem. I'm glad you like it.
Contents: Commandant, I planted this rose myself...
Sorry that I never told you about this. I just wanted to give you a surprise today...
But I never thought that Commandant would be the first to give me a flower.
Thank you... I'm so happy.

Name: Bianca: Zero
BtnContent: It feels great to understand you.
Contents: Commandant, as a leader, you should manage your work-life balance.
Seeing your white rose reminded me of what other team members said about this date.
"The date was only a homophone... Still, everyone wanted to spend that day with their Mr. or Mrs. Right..."
So I wrote these numbers on the gift box in the hope that this flower could bring you my sincere prayers and wishes.

Name: Nanami: Storm
BtnContent: Thanks... Let me put on my goggles first.
Contents: Oooh? FOR ME?
Nanami's so glad! I wish Commandant can be as happy as Nanami!
Let Nanami see... Ahah, there it is!
Ta-da! Take it, Commandant! It's one of Nanami's best stuff!

Name: Kamui: Bastion
BtnContent: I will not forget.
Contents: Commandant, you copy? This is Kamui from an encrypted private channel. Make sure you listen to this! *Beep—*
Hey, Commandant, you busy? It's been a while since we last spoke!
Today is the day of love! You sent me flowers, didn't you? I'm the only one to receive your gift of love, right?
I'm so happy! Commandant, I've got something for you too! See, I went to the park and picked the most beautiful rose there!
Sure. Will you come to me on this day every year? It's a deal then! I'll always be waiting for you!

Name: Karenina: Blast
BtnContent: Yeah, I'm free.
Contents: I knew you would be writing those reports in the office. Hey, you don't have anything on, do you?
Good...
Why are you sitting on my sofa all of a sudden?
I sit where I want to sit!
By the way... You're free tonight, aren't you? I'll assume you are if you don't reply!

Name: Watanabe: Nightblade
BtnContent: It's a promise then.
Contents: Morning, Commandant. How's work? I just...got your gift.
Such a gift on such a day... Are you trying to tell me something?
Anyway, I can feel your passion... Just remember to check your mailbox later.
If you like it, I'll take you to the sea of flowers the next time you come to Oasis.

Name: Lucia: Dawn
BtnContent: I'll try to become the best Commandant too.
Contents: Commandant, here's my gift for you in return. I'm not very good at this, so please forgive me if you don't like it...
But I will keep trying... To become your weapon that can cut through all the obstacles, and...to become the best Construct in your mind.

Name: Liv: Lux
BtnContent: I'll be with you.
Contents: Commandant, you don't have to do this.
I love the flowers, but what I really want is...
To have you by my side.

Name: Lee: Entropy
BtnContent: I like it a lot, thanks.
Contents: I found this rose in some ruins during a mission long ago.
It was so beautiful. According to the database, on certain important dates, people in the Golden Age would give such flowers...to their important ones.
I recorded all its data, including the angle of every single petal, in my M.I.N.D. so I could restore it. It is the only rose I have stored in my M.I.N.D... And I hope you can see it too.

Name: Liv: Luminance
BtnContent: Alright.
Contents: Commandant, thanks for your rose. I love it.
Actually... I have a little surprise for you too.
Can you come to the deck of Babylonia later?

Name: Kamui: Tenebrion
BtnContent: I'll take good care of this.
Contents: Hey, Commandant, you busy? Mind if I spare some of your time?
I got your gift, so I was wondering if I should do something to return your favor. How about I give myself to you... Joking! Hehe.
Anyway, I've got a little surprise for you! Don't tell anyone else!
Make sure you take good care of it! I want to stay with Commandant forever just like this gift.

Name: Karenina: Ember
BtnContent: What about a hug?
Contents: You should expect to see me today when you gave me that.
So what's with this stupid outfit? You look miserably clueless!
Whatever, just give me your hand. Don't you know how to hold hands?
Wait a sec, don't grab me all of a sudden! Don't use so much force, you fool!

Name: Nanami: Pulse
BtnContent: Thanks... Wait, what?
Contents: I'm back! It's a me! Na☆na☆mi!
Why didn't you tell Nanami earlier!? Do you know how difficult it is to take this out?
I had to return to the lab within 15 sec, smash—I mean open the liquid nitrogen container, and rush back here!
Let me think... You shall have a one-day date with Nanami as punishment!

Name: α
BtnContent: That's a bit difficult...
Contents: Are you waiting for me...? Doesn't seem so. Fine.
I never thought you would care about such a date in Babylonia.
Honestly, that gift of yours wasn't very useful. In other words, I didn't like it.
If you are ever going to give me something again... Just pack yourself up and come to the Ascendant's base.

Name: Watanabe: Astral
BtnContent: I want to see you too.
Contents: Commandant, it's been a while. How have you been?
I found a rose in an abandoned stronghold while patrolling. I didn't know why, but you were the first thing that came to my M.I.N.D... So I brought it back in the hope that you would like it.
Then I saw your gift. You were thinking exactly what I was thinking, weren't you?
I have put your rose in a vase. Hope I can see you before it withers, if possible.

Name: Ayla: Brilliance
BtnContent: I'm ready!
Contents: Happy May 20th, Commandant! I didn't expect to get a gift from you.
Ah... What I mean is, I'm actually very happy.
Because it was the first time that I got such a valuable gift. Well, Commandant, are you ready for my "real gift"?

Name: Bianca: Veritas
BtnContent: Yeah, be there soon.
Contents: Thanks for your gift, Commandant.
By the way, "520 Days With You" just hit the theaters today. Let's watch it together.
And... There's something I want to tell you too.

Name: Sophia: Silverfang
BtnContent: Thank you, Sophia.
Contents: So this is true...
This is for you.
I heard today was a day to exchange gifts with important ones.
I spent a lot of time preparing this.

Name: Chrome: Arclight
BtnContent: Come to me.
Contents: Incoming communication from Strike Hawk—Chrome's dedicated channel.
Commandant of Gray Raven, please, allow me to call you by your name this time.
KURONAME, I have received your gift. I don't know if I have understood this correctly...
Speaking of roses, I wonder if you have ever heard of "Unter der Rose"—
I know this may not be allowed, but I want to be there with you.

Name: New Year Gift 1
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Is this for... me? Thank you, Commandant.
In this new year, the Gray Raven squad and I will continue to fight alongside you.
Happy New Year, Commandant.

Name: New Year Gift 2
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Is this for... me? Thank you, Commandant.
In this new year, the Gray Raven squad and I will continue to fight alongside you.
Happy New Year, Commandant.

Name: New Year Gift 3
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: ...Presents? You think this sort of tomfoolery would work on me?
But since it's you, I guess I'll accept it. Just for now.
Next time, get something more memorable.

Name: New Year Gift 4
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Is this a... present? May I really?
Commandant, you're always so kind...
Thank you, Commandant. And, Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 5
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Is this a... present? May I really?
Commandant, you're always so kind...
Thank you, Commandant. And, Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 6
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Is this a... present? May I really?
Commandant, you're always so kind...
Thank you, Commandant. And, Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 7
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Ah, Commandant. Here you are. The data report I sent you 1 hour and 36 minutes 07 seconds ago is still unread. If it's because the function for analysis is...
What? A New Year present...? For me?
I, ahem, well, thanks. Happy New Year, Commandant.

Name: New Year Gift 8
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Ah, Commandant. Here you are. The data report I sent you 1 hour and 36 minutes 07 seconds ago is still unread. If it's because the function for analysis is...
What? A New Year present...? For me?
I, ahem, well, thanks. Happy New Year, Commandant.

Name: New Year Gift 9
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Ooh! That's my pal! You got me a present!
Oh, it's a New Year present!
Thanks! I wish you a Happy New Year too!

Name: New Year Gift 10
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Ooh! That's my pal! You got me a present!
Oh, it's a New Year present!
Thanks! I wish you a Happy New Year too!

Name: New Year Gift 11
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Oh, oh! Nanami's got a New Year present too? Yay!
I remember in the files that, people back in the Golden Age would greet each other around this time, right?
So... Nanami shall revive this tradition! Commandant! Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 12
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: Oh, oh! Nanami's got a New Year present too? Yay!
I remember in the files that, people back in the Golden Age would greet each other around this time, right?
So... Nanami shall revive this tradition! Commandant! Happy New Year!

Name: New Year Gift 13
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: A New Year present for me?
Thank you, Commandant of Gray Raven.
Happy New Year.

Name: New Year Gift 14
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: A present? Pfft, I'm not a kid, I don't want it.
A-alright, fine... But only because you're insisting so annoyingly.
(H-Happy New Year...) Nothing! Hmph!

Name: New Year Gift 15
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: A present? Pfft, I'm not a kid, I don't want it.
A-alright, fine... But only because you're insisting so annoyingly.
(H-Happy New Year...) Nothing! Hmph!

Name: New Year Gift 16
BtnContent: 明けましておめでとう
Contents: A New Year present? All the trouble just for me...?
Oh, well. Guess I better co-operate then.
Happy New Year.
